about_the_game:
Beat your friends in Brister!
A fast paced combination of the classic Pong and Turf War.

Dominate the field by conquering your opponents squares and gain the upper hand!

Play the classic Pong but with a twist! Hit the opponents squares with your ball to paint them in your own color. But be careful, your opponent will do the same. The player with more squares in the end wins the match!

Play against your friends in local multiplayer or use Steam Remote Play to play across the world!
Unlock new characters with abilities and different maps.

Don't just dominate the field, but bombard your enemy with special attacks, gaining the upper hand and ensuring victory or activate defensive powerups that may help you turn the battle, you thought you already lost, making an epic comeback. Because no round is over until the buzzer rings so make every single second count.

Let the chaos unfold on the battlefield!
